project.name: C-C789A-OSSL-09-ST01-DT03-DF16-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C789A-OSSL-09-ST01-DT03-DF16-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Generate an RSA private key Reads in a integer and uses the value to allocate memory for a string on the stack. Because the input value is unchecked can allocate arbitrarily large value, resulting in a resource drain

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
